alternativeNames: Parsons, Matthew Jonathan; Konrat, Matthew Jonathan von
comments: 'von Konrat' is correct form according to P.J. de Lange.
examples: Davallia tasmanii subsp. cristata von Konrat, Braggins & de Lange in New Zealand J. Bot., 37(4): 586 (1999).
